thread.title: Adrian Peterson was questionable after getting sick in worst way ever
thread.title_full: Adrian Peterson was questionable after getting sick in worst way ever - CBSSports.com

author: Will Brinson
title: Adrian Peterson was questionable after getting sick in worst way ever
text:
Adrian Peterson was randomly downgraded to questionable with an illness on Friday afternoon. It terrified fantasy owners and Vikings fans because if he was sick he might not play.
Turns out Peterson vomited because he swallowed his chew on a bumpy plane ride. No, really. 
Per FOX broadcast, Adrian Peterson swallowed his chew on a bumpy team flight Saturday. Vomited upon arrival. Hence, injury report downgrade.
â€” Kevin Seifert (@SeifertESPN) October 25, 2015 This is easily the grossest reason to vomit ever. 
Few things are as nasty as chewing tobacco and nothing's grosser than swallowing chewing tobacco. 
Theoretically the Vikings had to list him when he vomited (as we understand it), what with the requirements of the injury reports (or at least it wouldn't be worth it not to report). 
The hardest thing to understand is how you could be on a plane ride so bumpy the chewing tobacco flew out of your lip/cheek and down your throat. 

AP gacked over chewing tobacco. (USATSI) 

Topics: Adrian Peterson , Will Brinson , Minnesota Vikings , NFL
